loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en:
Ma. Victoria is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Victoria is 44 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Ma. Victoria has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ma. Victoria requested a 22,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing net and gears for her business.

Ma. Victoria has been in this business for nine years. Ma. Victoria would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net and gears

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase vegetable seeds for sowing.

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
Martha, a sus 60 años de edad, todavía tiene energías para luchar por su bienestar, es una mujer soltera y nunca tuvo hijos, por lo que todos los gastos corren por su cuenta, los mismos que con apoyo de algunos familiares logra suplir.
Durante 30 años tuvo una tienda de abarrotes ubicada en su vivienda, pero por cuestiones familiares y una disminución súbita en las ventas, se vio obligada a cerrarla.
Por la necesidad de generar ingresos para su sustento, quiere reiniciar su negocio y por ello solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (lácteos, mecato, galletería, productos de aseo), esto le permitirá comenzar nuevamente a prestar el servicio a su comunidad, mientras se beneficia de los ingresos que recibe por su labor.
Martha manifiesta que su edad no le impide soñar y mucho menos seguir luchando para hacer realidad sus objetivos, especialmente el de fortalecer y acreditar bien su negocio y convertirlo en un minimercado en el que toda su clientela encuentre lo necesario, así se sentirá feliz y mejorará su calidad de vida para tener una vejez tranquila.
texts.en:
Martha is 60 years old and still has the energy to strive for her wellbeing.  She is single and never had children because she must pay for everything and she is able to do it with help from some relatives.

For the past 30 years she has had a grocery store located in her home, but had to close it because of family issues and lagging sales.

Out of a need to generate an income, she wants to restart the business and is asking for this loan to buy inventory (dairy, pastries, cookies, toiletries) so she can start again and provide service to the community, while she benefits from the income.

Martha says that her age doesn’t impede her dreams and much less from continuing to strive toward her goals, especially strengthening and accrediting her business, making it a minimart where everyone can find what they need.  This way she will feel happy and her quality of life will improve so she can have a peaceful old age.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Marcela Teodora

texts.es:
Marcela Vive en la ciudad de Camaná, es una mujer con mucho carisma y muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que trabaja muy duro cada día para poder salir adelante, ella es profesora y le gusta mucho enseñar a sus alumnos por ello cree que le va bien en su empleo.

Marcela está muy agradecida ya que gracias al apoyo de los prestamistas kiva podrá comprar los útiles para su menor hija, como cuadernos, libros, materiales, entre otros; así podrá ir su hija a la escuela sin inconvenientes y Marcela seguirá trabajando muy duro para poder salir adelante y hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija”.
texts.en:
Marcela lives in the city of Camaná. She is a woman with a lot of charisma and desire to succeed, which is why she works very hard every day to be able to get ahead. She is a teacher and she really likes teaching her students, which is why she thinks it is going well for her at work.

Marcela is very thankful since, thanks to the support of the Kiva lenders, she will be able to buy supplies for her youngest daughter, such as notebooks, books, materials, and more. Thus her daughter can go to school worry-free and Marcela will continue working very hard to be able to get ahead and make her great dream - giving her daughter access to a professional career - happen.

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Segundo Lorenzo

texts.es:
Segundo vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, es un hombre muy trabajador, actualmente trabaja como vigilante y también trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, ambos trabajos le permiten a segundo poder salir adelante ya que de ellos depende que pueda tener un sustento para sobrevivir.

Segundo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la  ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a la mototaxi, de esta manera podrá seguir luchando y haciendo realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un negocio rentable”.
texts.en:
Segundo's a very hardworking man.  He lives in the city of Guadalupe and currently works as as a security guard and as a motorcycle taxi driver.  Both jobs allow him to get ahead, and his support and survival depend on them.

Segundo's very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to perform general maintenance on his motorcycle taxi.  He'll be able to continue striving to achieve his big dream of having a profitable business.

loans.use: to perform general maintenance on his vehicle

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a mother of two children; her son is 21 years old and daughter 19 years old. 

Mariam and her husband are involved in farming. They particularly keep 10 piglets and cultivate some potatoes. The arable land that they own is too small, that's why the cultivated potatoes are for family use only. Mariam also keeps a greenhouse. She cultivates different greens there and sells in local markets. Agricultural income is the only income for the family and Mariam would like to improve it. She asks for this loan of 2,100 USD to be able to purchase a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse and potato seeds. The loan will be a big support for Mariam's small farm and she hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse and potato seeds

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 49 years old, married with ten children. Six of her children are in school, she is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Merlinda has a business making and selling dried fish in the Philippines. Merlinda requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish for her dried fish making.

Merlinda has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, Merlinda would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish for her dried fish making.

loans.name: Blanca Cecilia

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer activa y trabajadora, su creatividad le ha permitido generar ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
Desde hace muchos años se dedica a fabricar muñecos en tela y algodón siliconado, con una máquina de coser que tiene en su vivienda, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y con el tiempo fue perfeccionando su técnica, la producción es vendida a conocidos, familiares y amigos que le realizan encargos.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, algodón), esto le permitirá cumplir con la producción que tiene pendiente y así mejorar las ventas e ingresos.
Blanca manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es tener una línea propia de confección de camisas y pijamas, para incursionar en un mercado nuevo y tener mejor rentabilidad en el negocio, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Blanca is an active and hardworking woman whose creativity has allowed her to generate income to help her husband with the household finances.

For many years she has been making cloth and silicone cotton dolls with a sewing machine she has at home.  She learned this on her own and perfected her techniques over time.  She sells to relatives, friends, and acquaintances that place orders with her.

She is asking for this loan to buy supplies in quantity (fabric, thread, cotton).  This will allow her to complete her pending production and improve her sales and income.

Blanca says that her greatest desire is to have her own line of shirts and pajamas to enter a new market and have better profits so she can improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Tynarbek

texts.ru: Тынарбек 26 лет, холост, проживает с родителями. У Тынарбека - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Тынарбек занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Тынарбека, на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 овцы, парник расположен на территории дома, также имеется земельная доля, на которой ежегодно выращивает арбуз, хлопок, кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тынарбек обратился в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупа высококачественных семян арбузов, хлопка, кукурузы для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Тынарбек намерен получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Тынарбек планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку грузовой автомашины.
texts.en: Tynarbek is 26 years old, a bachelor, and lives with his parents. Tynarbek has a high school education, and as the primary source of income for his family he farms and raises livestock, which he started 8 years ago with 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to his tireless work Tynarbek now owns two milk cows, two sheep, and a barn near the house, and also a plot of land where he grows watermelon, cotton, and corn each year for family use and sale. His total monthly income is 9,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop his business Tynarbek contacted the Bai Tushum bank for a loan to buy high quality melon, cotton, and corn seeds for planting, and fertilizer for the soil. Tynarbek expects to have a good harvest, which will increase the family's capital. He plans to invest earnings from use of the loan into expanding his livestock herd, and also plans to save for purchase of a transport vehicle.

loans.use: to buy corn, melon and cotton seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy washing machines.

loans.name: Marandu Group

texts.es:
El grupo Marandu está en el  ciclo numero 7mo del programa de comité de mujeres, también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, quienes a través de las capacitaciones desean ir mejorando la calidad de vida de ellas y sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Gladis quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha ido mejorando bastante su economía gracias al trabajo que ella hace, entre lo cual comenta que es cocinera, y que le sale muy bien sus comidas, es por medio de este trabajo que se gana la vida honradamente, a la vez que ayuda a su familia.
La Sra. Gladis solicita de este préstamo para la compra de verduras, carnes, condimentos, harina, galleta molida y productos en general, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Marandu Group is in its 7th cycle of the Women's Committee Program. The group members also participate in the Poverty Elimination Program for people who wish to undergo training to improve quality of life for themselves and their families. 

One of the members is Señora Gladis, whose last survey result indicated that her standard of living falls within level three poverty. This result shows that Señora Gladis's situation has been improving thanks to her work. Señora Gladis is a talented cook and has found that preparing food allows her to make a living honestly while helping her family. 

Señora Gladis is applying for a loan to purchase vegetables, meat, condiments, flour, breadcrumbs, and miscellaneous ingredients to prepare food that she can sell. These supplies will help Señora Gladis finalize her business plan, which will allow her to boost her income.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, condiments, flour, breadcrumbs, and miscellaneous ingredients to prepare food that she can sell.

loans.name: Limpio

texts.es:
El Sr. Limpio está casado con la Sra. Martina hace  varios años, con quien tiene 4 hijos ya mayores e independiente a ellos, que han criado con el fruto de su esfuerzo.
Limpio tiene un kiosco donde vende todo tipo de artículos de primera necesidad. El y su esposa se iniciaron en esta actividad con un pequeño capital que juntaron con el dinero de otro trabajo que realizaba el Sr. Limpio. Gracias al trabajo que han hecho  tienen una casa cómoda y no le hicieron faltar nada a sus hijos.  Él ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable y honesta en sus compromisos. 
En esta ocasión solicita el préstamo para aumentar su cantidad de productos, ya que quiere comprar bebidas, lácteos, verduras, condimentos, frutas y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por mantener su hogar y ayudado siempre por su esposa.
texts.en:
Limpio has been married to Martina for several years, and has four adult, independent children with her, who were raised with the fruits of their effort. Limpio has a kiosk where he sells all types of convenience store items. He and his wife started this business with the small amount of capital they saved from the money earned at the other job Limpio had. Thanks to the work they have done, they have a comfortable house and their children did not grow up lacking anything. 

He has shown himself to be a very responsible person who is honest in his commitments. On this occasion, he is requesting a loan to increase the quantity of products he has. He wants to buy soda, dairy products, vegetables, condiments, fruit, and more, and that way be able to continue with his sales, fighting to support his home, always helped by his wife.

loans.use: to buy soda, dairy products, vegetables, condiments, fruit and more

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a 49-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. 

She deals in the selling of secondhand clothes as her main source of income alongside agriculture. She started this business to earn a living and have a better standard of living. She faces a number of challenges, including price changes, seasonal customers and weather changes that affect her business since it's located outside a building, but she has hopes that in future she will own a wholesale boutique.

She is requesting for a loan to buy more secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es: María es una señora de 69 años de edad, se encuentra separada de su esposo pero ella sale adelante con su propio esfuerzo, ya que se dedica a criar pollos en un corral de su casa, esta mujer trabajadora vive  con su hija y sus 3 nietos que  se encuentran asistiendo a la escuela. Con el crédito va a comprar pollos, morochillo y vacunas para criar muy bien a sus animalitos. El sueño de María es seguir adelante con la crianza de pollos y hacer unos corrales más amplios  para que su negocio crezca y de esta manera tener el dinero suficiente para todos sus gastos y ayudar con lo que más pueda a sus nietos ya su hija.
texts.en:
María, 69, is a  hardworking woman who lives with her daughter and three grandchildren, who attend school.  She's separated from her husband but gets ahead on her own.  She earns a living raising chickens in a chicken coop at her home.

With the loan she's going to buy chickens, corn feed, and vaccines so she can raise her little animals very well.

María's dream is to get ahead raising chickens and to make some bigger coops so her business grows.  That way she'll have enough money for all her expenses and help her grandchildren and daughter as much as possible.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Kuña Tekove Group

texts.es:
Este grupo llamado Kuña Tekove está en el  ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al trabajo que todas están haciendo van mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Diana quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha mejorado a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que tiene su propio kiosko, donde tiene todo tipo de productos, como ser bebidas, comestibles, golosinas, galletitas, y demás. Ella es una persona muy sacrificada que día a día trabaja desde muy tempranas horas para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
La Sra. Diana pide este préstamo para la compra de golosinas, galletitas, jugos y productos en general , lo que le ayudará a tener y concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This communal bank, called "Kuña Tekove," is in its 3rd loan cycle with the Program of Women's Committees.  All of the members work and help each other to get ahead.  They are taking the Poverty Elimination Survey, where thanks to the work that all of them are doing, their poverty situation has been improving.  

One of the members of this group is Diana.  In her last survey, she was found to be at poverty level three.  She wants to say that this has improved, thanks to her efforts and work.  She has a business selling all types of products from a kiosk, including drinks, food, candy, cookies, and other items. Diana is a very self-sacrificing person who works each day from the early morning hours so that she can help her loved ones.

Diana is requesting this loan to buy snacks, cookies, juices, and other products.  This will help her to carry out her business plan and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy candy, cookies, juice, and other products to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase barbed wire, staples, posts and to pay for manual labour.

loans.name: Andrea Lucia

texts.es:
La joven Andrea Lucia  trabaja en un centro hospitalario de la ciudad de León, desempeñando el cargo de enfermera, desde hace ocho años, labora de lunes a domingo en diferentes horarios, es madre de una hija en edad escolar. 

El crédito que solicito a Ceprodel lo utilizó para  compra de bloque, cemento, arena, piedrín hierro, zinc y perline para la construcción de un cuarto y así brindarle a su única hija más comodidad.
texts.en:
Young Andrea Lucia has worked as a nurse in a hospital center in the city of Leon for 8 years.  She works every day on different shifts.  She is the mother of a school-aged daughter.

Andrea Lucia is requesting a loan from CEPRODEL to buy cement blocks, cement, sand, gravel, steel, sheets of corrugated metal, and beams to build a room.  This way, she can provide her only daughter with greater comfort.

loans.use: to buy building materials to add a room

loans.name: Marianita

texts.en:
Marianita is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable-selling business in the Philippines. Marianita is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Marianita has been sustaining her business activities through her past twenty-three loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Aboubakar

texts.fr: Aboubakar est un jeune homme âgé de 32 ans il a une petite boutique des produit agricole dans un marché de la cité capital.il gère cette petite boutique depuis 10 ans aujourd'hui, ce grâce a cette petite activité qu'il prend soins de ses parents ses frères et sœur et qu'il peut de temps en temps pouvoir subvenir a ses petit besoin. il ce retourne aujourdhui au prés de vous pour solliciter le soutient financier pour satisfaire la demande de sa clientèles qui grandi de jour en jour, et pour en magasiner assai de marchandises pour n'est plus avoir des problèmes de rupture de stock, pour pouvoir prendre soins de sa famille et de pouvoir léguer plus tard.
texts.en:
Aboubakar is a 32-year-old man who runs a small agricultural shop at a market in the capital city.  He has been running his shop for ten years now, and thanks to the shop, he is able to take care of his parents, brothers and sister, and help them out from time to time.

He has requested this loan in order to be better able to satisfy his customers, whose demands grow by the day.  He would also like to be able to have enough merchandise to avoid running out of stock, take better care of his family and be able to bequeath some assets later on.

loans.use: to increase his stock of merchandise.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a 42-year-old married man with 3 children aged 15, 3 and 1 living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

He is a farmer who sells tea seedlings. He is facing challenges of weather changes; however, he has a vision of having well-established nursery beds featuring many different types of plants so as to widen his market and serve different interests. 

Wilson needs a loan to improve his nursery bed by buying polythene papers and roofing materials, and to pay for labor.

loans.use: to improve his tea nursery bed by buying polythene papers and roofing materials, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Selsa

texts.es:
La Sra. Selsa tiene 62 años de edad, desde hace 9 años es dueña de una granja con su marido el Sr. Maruto en el que se dedican a la venta de leche y menudencias. 
El lugar tiene aproximadamente 8 has. donde además tienen ganado vacuno, aves de corral y una huerta. Son personas muy sacrificadas y luchadoras, que con gran sacrificio han salido adelante y dan a su familia todo para que no les falte nada y que no tengan que pasar por necesidades como las que ellos tuvieron que pasar.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en mejorar su granja, como ser mejoras en el cerco, postes, y demás, agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de ir mejorando.
texts.en:
Selsa is 62 years old, she's owned a farm together with her husband, Maruto, for 9 years, selling milk and offal. 
With about 8 hectares, they also have cattle, poultry and an orchard. They are, tough, hard working people, that, with sacrifice, have been able to move ahead and provide their family with everything they need so they don't have to go through hard times like they did. 
She is asking for this loan to invest in improving her farm, such as fixing her fencing, posts, and others. She is thankful for this opportunity that helps her improve and grow.

loans.use: to improve her farm, by buying items like fencing, poles and others.

loans.name: Ahadi Group

texts.fr: La cliente Nyassa, femme entrepreneur est présidente du groupe de credit Ahadi. A l’âge à de 49 ans,  elle est mariée à  un homme sans travail. Mère de 9 enfants  tous scolarisés, elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter 50 sacs de farine de manioc et mais. Son rêve est de construire une maison.  Au final, elle remercie Hekima  de soutenir les femmes entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
Nyassa is a female entrepreneur and the president of the loan group, 'Ahadi'.  She is 49 years old and married to a man who is currently out of work.  She has nine children who all attend school.  Nyassa has been selling food for more than ten years.

She has requested this loan in order to buy 50 sacks of cassava flour and maize.

Her dream is to be able to build a house.

Nyassa is grateful to the field partner, Hekima, for the support that they offer to women entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 50 sacks of cassava flour and maize for resale.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana es una señora muy trabajadora, que luchando está tratando de salir adelante, con su familia y es por eso que se está esforzando tanto.
Su aspiración es poder ser una buena profesional en la carrera que eligió. Ella está estudiando la carrera de enfermería con la cual quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas con sus estudios, como así también poder ayudar a su familia.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder seguir estudiando, ya que necesita cubrir sus gastos de materiales, fotocopias, y demás, y así seguir luchando por su sueño anhelado de ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Ana is very hard-working and is fighting to try to get ahead with her family. She is putting in a lot of effort to do this.

Ana wants to be a professional in her chosen field: she is studying nursing, and hopes to be able to help other people with her studies, as well as helping her family.

Ana is applying for this loan in order to continue studying as she needs to cover the costs of materials, photocopies and more, and to continue fighting for her dream of being someone in life.

loans.use: to pay for the costs of materials, photocopies and more.

loans.name: Azcurra Group

texts.es:
Azcurra es un grupo que se formó en la ciudad de Caacupé con 17 integrantes, todas ellas son muy trabajadoras y están luchando por salir adelante y mejorar los emprendimientos que cada una hace y con lo cual ayudan a sus seres queridos.
La señora Martina es la presidenta del comité del comité, ella es casada y cuenta que con su marido ayudan a mantener la casa, es una familia que trabaja por salir adelante y donde todos se ayudan.  Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras y comenta que ya tiene muy buena clientela que le compra siempre sus productos frescos.
La Señora Martina pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, como mandioca, tomates, locotes, para surtir el negocio. Comenta que su negocio lo tiene en la ciudad de Asunción, por lo que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas del día.
texts.en:
Azcurra is a group that formed in the city of Caacupé. The group has 17  members all of them are very hard workers who are fighting to come out ahead and improve their business ventures that each one has and which will help their loved ones.

Martina is the President of the committee. She is married and says that with her husband she helps to maintain the household. This is a family that work to come out ahead and which everyone helps.  She works selling vegetables and says she has a good clientele who always buy her fresh products.

Martina is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of vegetables such as cassavas, tomatoes, and green peppers to stock her store. She says that her store is in the city of Asunción so every day she works very early in the morning.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables such as cassavas, tomatoes, and green peppers to stock her store.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Virgen de Fatima está en su  ciclo  doce del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse las unas a las otras  para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 2 de las 17 señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir que siguen luchando por ir mejorando su calidad de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Gumercinda, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir que tiene varios aspectos de su vida en un nivel rojo, pero es consciente de que a través del esfuerzo y por medio de la elaboración  y venta de comidas que hace podrá seguir creciendo y ayudando a su familia. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo está creciendo y saliendo adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar pollo, jamón, queso, cebollas, tomates, locotes y demás, que son  sus elementos esenciales para hacer sus comestibles. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir creciendo y mejorando su vida.
texts.en:
Vigen de Fatima is in its 12th cycle with the women's committee program, where all promise to work and help each other to get ahead. 

They are investigating the elimination of poverty, where two of the 17 women are below the poverty line, which is to say, they keep fighting to keep improving their quality of life.

One of the members is Gumercinda, who in her survey showed a level of poverty below level one, which means various parts of her life are at a red level. However, she is conscious that through her effort and by way of making and selling food, she will be able to continue growing and helping her family. 

She is a very hardworking person who is growing and getting ahead with much effort. She is asking for this loan to buy chicken, ham, cheese, onions, tomatoes, peppers and more, which are the essential elements of making her food. 

She is grateful for this opportunity she is receiving to continue grwing and improving her life.

loans.use: to buy chicken, ham, cheese, onion, tomatoes, peppers and more.

loans.name: Lusik

texts.en:
Lusik lives in Gyulagarak village in the Lori region. Her elder son serves currently in the army and Lusik lives with her husband, mother-in-law and 12-year-old daughter. 

The family runs a farm. They keep cows, chickens and calves and cultivate potatoes and grass. 

The income that they get from agriculture is important for them to cover their basic costs. Lusik has decided to apply for this loan of USD 3,000 to purchase 2 calves, 2 piglets and potato seeds. This loan will help the whole family to enrich their farm and gather more agricultural income.

loans.use: to pay for 2 calves, 2 piglets and potato seeds.

loans.name: Romi

texts.en:
Romi runs a small stall selling snacks and airtime credits for mobile phones. Romi lives in Lebak, a semi-urban area about 3 hours from Jakarta. Romi is single.

Romi began working with PT Rekan Usaha Mikro Anda (Ruma) 1 year ago because he became interested in selling mobile airtime. He feels really excited to expand his business. For the last 3 months, he has made around $30–31 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). As the business expands, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Perpetuo Socorro Group

texts.es:
El grupo Perpetuo Socorro está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité, gracias a que cada una pone todo de sí, es que están mejorando bastante, tienen una excelente actitud y siempre participan activamente. Las integrantes han formado un grupo estable y unido gracias al trabajo en equipo y a la responsabilidad y solidaridad de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Patricia, quien tiene una despensa, y en la cual trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día. Comenta que al principio le costó un poco, pero que poco a poco fue afianzándose y que le está yendo cada vez mejor.
La Sra. Patricia solicita de este préstamo para la compra de productos varios,  como verduras, frutas, carne, enlatados y demás, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Perpetuo Socorro group is in its 3rd cycle of the committee program. Thanks to everyone putting in effort, they are improving significantly, have an excellent attitude and always participate actively. 

The members have formed a stable and united group, thanks to their work as a team, and the responsibility and solidarity of each one of them.

One of the members is Patricia, who has a pantry she works in every day, from the very early hours of the morning. She said at first, it struggled a bit, but little by little, it took hold and is doing better and better.

Patricia is asking for this loan to buy various products, such as vegetables, fruits, meat, canned goods and more, which will help her narrow down her business plan, helping her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, meat, canned goods and more.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es:
La  señorita Rosana es de la ciudad de Santaní, es soltera, y comenta que tiene una pequeña despensa y también se dedica a la venta de ropas en general, que sale en su motocicleta a realizar las ventas por las zonas aledañas.
Ella es una persona que pese a los obstáculos de la vida, lucha por crecer y salir adelante, es por eso que se está esforzando bastante. Ella solicita el préstamo para compras de artículos de roperías para la venta, con lo cual podrá seguir con sus ventas y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosana is from the city of Santaní. She is single and tells us that she has a small shop, and also works selling clothes. Rosana goes out on her motorcycle to make sales in the neighbouring areas.

Rosana is somebody who, despite obstacles, fights to grow and prosper, and so is putting in a lot of effort to do this. Rosana is applying for this loan in order to buy clothes to sell. With them she will be able to continue with her sales and meet her customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy clothing items to sell.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana tiene 19 años y estudia el segundo año de la carrera de contabilidad, en estos momentos le ayuda a su mama que tiene un taller de costura, y por medio de este trabajo también tiene un poco de ganancias para poder invertir en sus estudios.
Una de sus aspiraciones después de terminar su carrera es presentar su tesis y seguir estudiando alguna Maestría y también quiere ser una contadora bancaria. Ella es una joven muy decidida que quiere ser alguien en la vida.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus cuotas, de manera a poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Liliana is 19 years old and studying her second year of accounting. Her mother currently helps her - she has a dressmaking workshop and, with this work, has some profits to invest in Liliana's studies.

Liliana wants to submit her thesis after finishing her degree, and to do a Master's. She also wants to be a bank accountant. Liliana is very decided in that she wants to be someone in life.

Liliana is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees so that she may continue to study.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana es estudiante, también trabaja en una empresa familiar como cajera-vendedor, es de la ciudad de Santaní, está casada y con dos hijos.
Es una persona, honesta, trabajora, responsable y muy dedicada a su estudio, desea salir adelante con sus esfuerzos para alcanzar sus objetivos. Su meta es de tener su título Universitario de Arquitecta para poder trabajar de forma independiente y así sacar adelantes a sus hijos, y para que el día de mañana sean importantes en la sociedad.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, ya que quiere seguir trabajando y luchando por sus sueños.
texts.en:
Ana is a student, but she also works in a family business as a cashier-sales rep, is Santaní City. She is married with two children. 
She is an honest, hard working, responsible person, very devoted to her education. She wants to succeed in her efforts to reach her goals. Her purpose is to obtain her Bachelor's degree in Architecture to be able to work independently, and support her children, so they can contribute to society in the future. 
She is asking for this loan to pay her school fees, as she wants to continue working and fighting for her dreams.

loans.use: to pay for her college fees.

loans.name: Yesu Ni Jibu Group

texts.fr: La cliente Barhakomera  est membre de la banque villageoise Yesu ni jibu. A 36 ans, elle est mariée à un homme sans emploie et ensemble ils ont 5 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Femme d’affaire depuis 2004, elle est vendeuse des ustensiles de cuisine et de casseroles dans la rue. Avec ce  nouveau crédit, elle va acheter une douzaine de casserole. Ainsi, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle pour ses enfants et remercie Hekima d’appuyer les femmes à bas revenu.
texts.en:
Barhakomera  is a member of the 'banc villageois', Yesu ni jibu.  She is 36 years old and married to a man who is currently out of work.  Together they have five children who all attend school.  Barhakomera has been a business woman since 2004, she sells kitchen utensils and saucepans on the street.

Barhakomera will use this new loan to buy a dozen saucepans.  She hopes to be able to buy a plot of land for her children.  She is grateful to the field partner, Hekima, for the support that they offer to women on very low incomes.

loans.use: to buy a dozen saucepans for resale.

loans.name: Fortunato

texts.es:
Fortunato es de la ciudad de Encarnación, estudia y trabaja, y se está esforzando por ser un buen profesional. Está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, y con ello quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Comenta que está esforzándose al máximo para poder el día de mañana ser un profesional que sea útil a la sociedad. El pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y por medio de ello seguir estudiando. Agradece por esta oportunidad de seguir estudiando que recibe.
texts.en:
Fortunato is from the city of Encarnación. He both works and studies, and is putting in the effort in order to be a good professional. Fortunato is studying nursing and wants to be able to help other people.

Fortunato tells us that he is putting in the maximum effort in order to be a useful professional in society in the future. He is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and continue studying. Fortunato is grateful for this opportunity to keep on studying.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una persona muy trabajadora, que por medio de su esfuerzo ha ido mejorando y con lo cual esta ayudando a su familia. En su pequeña despensa esta trabajando día a día, todo esto para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
Comenta que su anterior préstamo de kiva lo uso para poder surtir su negocio, lo que le fue de mucha ayuda, hoy pode un nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo de nuevo en insumos varios para su negocio, como ser bebidas, comestibles, verduras, frutas y demás. agradece por la nueva ayuda que ella esta recibiendo para poder mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Juana is a very hard working person, whose efforts have helped her to improve and through which she is helping her family. She works daily in her small store in order to better the living conditions of her family. 

She says that she used her last Kiva loan to stock her business, which was a great help. She now requests a new loan to invest again in various supplies for her business, such as beverages, vegetables, fruits and other groceries. She is grateful for the renewed help she is receiving to be able to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, vegetables, fruits and other groceries to stock her store.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco viene de una familia humilde, él a pesar de ya ser docente sigue capacitándose para poder llegar a tener un mejor porvenir para su  familia y e hijos, ya que está casado y su esposa e hijos son grandes apoyos para él.
Comenta que está estudiando la carrera de ciencias de la educación, con lo cual podrá seguir creciendo y luchando por ser una persona más capacitada. El pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus cuotas, ya que así podrá seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Francisco comes from a humble family. Despite him being a teacher, he continues on with his training to provide for a better future for his family and children. His wife and children are a great support for him. 
He is studying to get a degree in Learning Sciences, so he can continue to grow and become a better skilled teacher. He is asking for this loan to pay for his school fees, to further his education even more.

loans.use: to pay for this college fees.

loans.name: Tushukuru Group

texts.fr: Madame Mukengere  est présidente dans Tushukuru, un groupe de crédit. Femme forte et entrepreneur, elle est âgée de 56 ans et mère de 12 enfants qui étudient tous. Elle est mariée à un chômeur. La cliente est une vendeuse de divers articles (sucre, sel, riz, etc...)  depuis 1984. Le nouveau prêt va permettre l’achat de 1sac de sucre, 1 sac de sel et 2 sacs de riz (sac de 50kg). Son vouloir est  d’agrandir son entreprise.  Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima de soutenir les femmes.
texts.en:
Mukengere is the president of the Tushukuru loan group.  She is a strong, woman entrepreneur, 56 years old and mother to twelve children who all attend school.  Mukengere is married to a man who is currently out of work.  She has been selling various items (sugar, salt, rice, etc) since 1984.

This new loan will allow her to buy one sack of sugar, one sack of salt and two sacks of rice (50kg sacks).  Her desire is to expand her business.

Mukengere is grateful to the field partner, Hekima, for the support which they offer to women.

loans.use: to buy 1 sack of sugar, 1 sack of salt and 2 sacks of rice (50 kg sacks) for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, nails, adhesive, varnish, reeds, and other supplies.

loans.name: Maria Tomasa

texts.es:
La señora María Tomasa de 53  años de edad es casada  vive en casa propia ya no tiene hijos que dependen de ella, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras.
Doña María Tomasa se dedica desde hace 05  años  a la venta de abarrotería como ser: frescos, churros, jabón, pollo, carnes, embutidos, granos básicos, sus clientes le prefieren por su amabilidad y buenos precios, es una mujer luchadora que desea mejorar su condición de vida, porque tenía una cocina de plástico y hoy la está construyendo de adobe.
Doña María Tomasa está solicitando el préstamo para surtir el negocio y quiere comprar azúcar, arroz, frijoles, queso, leche, aguas, etc. para así poder atender mejor a sus clientes ya que se acerca la época de semana santa y en esa época ella vente muchos frescos, agua, jugos y productos alimenticios, está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma, su sueño es mejorar su vivienda.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Febrero del 2014.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Tomasa is 53 years old. She is married and lives in her own house. She has no children who depend on her. She lives in a community of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras.

Doña Maria Tomasa has worked for 5 years selling groceries such as fresh foods, churros, soap, chicken, meats, cold meats, and basic grains. Her customers prefer her for her friendliness and good prices. She is a hard-working woman who wants to improve her living conditions, because she has a kitchen built with plastic [sheets], and now she is building it from adobe.

Doña Maria Tomasa is applying for the loan to stock her business. She wants to buy sugar, rice, beans, cheese, milk, water, etc., to thus be able to serve her customers better, since the Holy Week season is approaching, and at this time she sells a lot of fresh products, water, juices, and food products. She is very happy to continue working with Prisma. Her dream is to improve her house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  February 2014.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, beans, cheese, milk, water, etc. for her business

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte,el socio realiza servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es comprarse un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rodolfo makes a living through transportation.  He runs a taxi service through the streets of Cusco.  The member already has several years of experience with this business and it is going well.  His dream is to buy a new car.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy tires for his car.  He is happy for the loan and promises to complete the repayments.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos,la socia tambien fue profesora,la socia se dedica a este negocio varios años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los zapatos y ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar zapatos,blusas,pantalones y .

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member continues working in her business of selling clothing and shoes. She was also a teacher. She has worked in this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell shoes and clothing. She is applying for the loan to buy shoes, blouses, pants, and sweaters.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes, blouses, pants, and sweaters to sell

loans.name: Tupendane Group

texts.fr: La cliente Mapendo est une vaillante commerçante depuis 17 ans, présidente et membre d’un groupe d’affaires « Tupendane», âgée de 38 ans, mariée et mère de 5 enfants qui tous, étudient. Elle est vendeuse soulier en plastique. Elle étale son business sur la rue dans un quartier aminé. Elle sollicita un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va acheter 318 paires de souliers en plastique. Son conjoint est un comptable dans une école primaire de la place. Elle avait commence avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et  nourrir  ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour son savoir faire, en soutenant les femmes entrepreneurs dans les affaires tout en leur accordant des crédits sans garantie matérielle.
texts.en:
Mapendo, age 38, has been a valiant merchant for the last 17 years. She's president and a member of Tupendane Group. She's married and the mother of five children, who all go to school.

She sells plastic shoes. She displays her products on the street, in a lively neighborhood. She's seeking a loan from Kiva's partner, Hekima, in order to expand her business.

She will buy 318 pairs of plastic shoes. Her husband is an accountant with a local elementary school. She started her business with funds received from her husband.

In the future, she wishes to buy a land lot, and feed her children and send them to school. She thanks Hekima for its know-how in supporting female entrepreneurs in their businesses, by granting them loans without tangible guarantee.

loans.use: to buy 318 pairs of plastic shoes

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Vilma works hard to support her family.

She has a bamboo strips weaving business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried coconut meat. 

Vilma is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more bamboo for her weaving business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Vilma has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bamboo for her weaving business

loans.name: Paytsar

texts.en:
Paytsar lives in Shgharshik village of the Aragatsotn region. She lives there with her husband and 33-year-old son.

Paytsar's husband works at a local transporting company. With only his salary, it is just impossible to meet family's needs so Paytsar is involved in agriculture. She mainly cultivates potatoes and some grass, as well as keeps a livestock of pig, piglets, chickens and calves. 

Now Paytsar is preparing for spring works and needs some improvements to be done in the farm. That's the reason she has applied for this loan of USD 3,000. It will greatly assist her to purchase five piglets, forage for feeding the livestock, and seeds. 

The loan will be a big support for this hard-working woman with a good credit history behind her. 

Paytsar waits the lenders’ support.

loans.use: to pay for five piglets, forage for feeding the livestock, and seeds

loans.name: Bizoza Group

texts.fr:
Rebecca fait partie du groupe  Bizoza et  habite à Gitega. Elle a 29 ans et est mariée  à Ernest, un maçon. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants âgés   de 3 à 14  ans.


Elle fait le commerce de farine de manioc  depuis 1 an. 

Elle est  à son quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de farine de manioc à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Rebecca, age 29, lives in Gitega. She's a member of Bizoza Group. She's married to Ernest, a mason, and they have six children together, aged 3 to 14. 

For one year, she's been selling tapioca. This is her fourth loan with Turame. With this Kiva loan, she will bolster her working capital and buy a large amount of tapioca to resell, in order to increase her income.

In the forthcoming years, she would like to see her children study.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of tapioca

loans.name: Matumaini Panzi Group

texts.fr: Madame Ntakwinja, présidente dans le groupe de credit Matumaini Panzi est mère de 8 enfants scolarisés.  Agée de  43 ans, elle est mariée à un homme sans profession. Commerçante depuis 2007 au marché  central, avec ce prêt ; elle va  acheter  4 sacs d’haricots, 1 sac de 25kg de pomme de terre. Elle souhaite prospérer dans ses affaires et devenir grossiste. Ainsi, elle bénie Hekima et le remercie.
texts.en:
Ntakwinja is president of the loan group Matumaini Panzi.  She is 43 years old and mother to eight children who all attend school.  Her husband is currently out of work.  She has been a trader since 2007 at the central market.

Ntakwinja will use her loan to buy four sacks of beans and one 25kg sack of potatoes.  She hopes to prosper in her business and become a wholesaler.

She is grateful to the field partner, Hekima, and blesses the work that they do.

loans.use: to buy 4 sacks of beans and 1x25kg sack of potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 50-year-old married man with 6 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in selling fresh foods alongside selling pozzolana (cement material) as an additional income. He faces challenges of heavy rains which affect him a lot while transporting food to Kampala the main city where his clients are. However, he has a vision of buying a motorcycle and building rentals in order to have several sources of income. Joseph needs a loan to buy bananas and Irish potatoes for resale.

loans.use: to buy bananas and Irish potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Anush

texts.en:
Anush lives with her husband and sons (27 and 25 years old). The family is engaged in agriculture. They run a farm which includes livestock (four cows, a pig and chickens). Anush also cultivates grass for feeding the livestock. 

Because of family's poor conditions, they are hardly managing to cover basic living costs. 

The reason that Anush asks this loan of USD 2,500 is she wants to enlarge her farm. The loan will help her to purchase two cows, five piglets and some forage for the livestock. 

As the arable land that Anush owns is very small, she can't manage to feed the livestock, therefore the loan will greatly help her.

Anush will wait the lenders' goodwill.

loans.use: to pay for two cows, five piglets and some forage for the livestock

loans.name: Kasenyi Twimukye Group

texts.en: Christina is one of the members of Kasenyi Twimukye group and a mother of ten children, between twenty five and two years of age. She is 44 years old and involved in the fishing business, which is her major source of income. She is a hard working lady who works an average of eight hours per day on the fishing business and works in her bar which is her other source of income, when she is off from fishing. She started the business (fishing) in 2003 primarily because it was the main rewarding activity in her area of operation, Kasenyi, which is found in the Kasese district. She started the business with high hopes that she would make enough profit to be able to cater to the needs of her big family. This is the reason why she works so hard to see the business grow, slowly but steadily. She applied for a loan of five hundred thousand shillings only (500,000) to buy new fishing nets so that she can catch more fish and make more profit from the business. Her clients are mainly people who trade in fish and these have supported her since they are a good market for her fish. However, Christina has a challenge of limited capital, since her business is still small and does not generate enough income. She strongly believes that with the UGAFODE facility, if given, she will grow her business and make profits big enough to cater for all needs of her family.  She hopes the profit will pay for school fees for all her children so that they can get quality education and be in a position some day to compete for jobs on the job market, which has always been her dream.

loans.use: To buy fish nets

loans.name: Máximo

texts.es:
El señor Máximo tiene 54 años, es  docente y mecánico de profesión y su esposa es la señora María quien tiene 56 años, los hijos de esta pareja ya son personas mayores, independientes, personas de bien gracias al trabajo de ambos.
Máximo es una persona muy trabajadora, que con mucho esfuerzo ha dado a su familia todo para una vida sin privaciones. El pide este préstamo para la compra de neumáticos ya que tiene un camión que presta servicios de fletes, y quiere poder arreglarlo. Agradece a Fundación paraguaya y a kiva por el apoyo recibido y comenta que tiene pesado realizar muchas inversiones más, para el bienestar de él y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Máximo, 54, is a teacher and a mechanic by profession.  His wife, María, is 56 years old.  Their children are already independent adults and decent people thanks to Máximo and María's work.

Máximo's a very hardworking person who has sacrificed a lot to give his family a life without deprivation.  He's requesting this loan to buy tires.  He has a truck he needs to fix because he uses it to offer fleet service.

He's grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and to Kiva for their support.  He said he plans to invest a lot more on behalf of his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy tires to repair his truck

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children Margarita works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling shells. Margarita is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy more fish for her dried fish making business.

Margarita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish for her business

loans.name: La Révélation Group

texts.fr: Mugondo est un vaillant commerçant et membre du groupe d’affaires « La Révélation », âgé de 52 ans père de 10 enfants dont 5 étudient et 5 autres sont déjà maries. Il est un changeur de monnaie (Cambiste) dans le centre ville. Sa conjointe est ménagère. Il a sollicité un crédit auprès de Hekima. Il va améliorer son travail des changes, qu’il a choisi comme activité principale et accroitre son capital depuis 10 ans. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d'acheter les devises étrangères. Il commença avec de fonds reçu après vente d’une parcelle. Dans l’avenir, il souhaite  construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, il remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux petits entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Mugondo is a committed businessman and member of the business group 'La Révélation'.  He is 52 years old and father to ten children of whom five currently attend school and five others are already married.  He is a foreign exchange trader in the centre of town, and his wife is a housekeeper.  He began his business ten years ago and it has grown steadily ever since.  The sale of a plot of land provided the necessary funds to start the business.

Mugondo has requested this loan from the field partner, Hekima, in order to buy foreign currencies.  

In the future, Mugondo would like to build a house, educate and feed his children.

He is grateful to Hekima for the support which they offer to non-bankable, small entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy foreign currencies for his exchange business.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is 40 years old, married, and has one child who is in school.

Anecita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Anecita requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Anecita has been raising pigs for 18 years now, and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Anecita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is 35 years old, married, and has one child who is in school.

Margie is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Margie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Margie has been in the pig fattening for 5 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Margie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth works hard to support her family. Ruth is married and has a buy and sell natural medicines business in the Philippines.

Ruth requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of natural medicines to sell to her customers.

Ruth has been in this business for 10 years now.

Ruth would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of natural medicines to sell to her customers

loans.name: Imaranjara Tusisimuke Group

texts.en: Muhamed is a 43-year-old gentleman with 4 children, of which three are of school going age. He is a member of the Imaranjara group where members get loans as a group by guaranteeing each other without any security. He is purely in agriculture where he grows maize and beans in Ruteete sub county. Muhamed says bad weather affects his activities and he dreams of building a permanent house for his family. He therefor wants a loan to buy seeds of maize and beans for planting and prepare gardens for the seasons.

loans.use: to buy seeds of maize and beans for planting

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 44 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Lucia is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. 

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional piglets, feed and vitamins for her business.

Lucia has been in pig fattening for two years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Lucia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed and vitamins for her business

loans.name: Willy

texts.en:
Willy is a 53-year-old married, honest, and hardworking man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has six children, ages between 25 and 12 years and all attend school. 

He has been dealing in the buying and selling of maize, beans, cassava, and potatoes to help on family progress. He also earns from salary as a teacher, and is challenged by low prices, plus delayed salary payments from the government. 

Willy hopes for prosperity in his business, and is asking for a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Silvy

texts.en:
Silvy runs a small stall selling airtime credits for mobile phones. She lives in Lebak, a semi-urban area about 3 hours from Jakarta. Silvy is married and lives with two persons in the family home.

Silvy began working with PT Rekan Usaha Mikro Anda (Ruma) 2 months ago because she became interested in selling mobile airtime. She feels really excited to expand her business. For the last 2 months, she has made around $16–17 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). As the business expands, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more shoes, jeans, T- Shirts and other clothing for resale.

loans.name: San Ramon Group

texts.es:
El comité San Ramon esta en el sexto ciclo están trabajando en forma conjunta en la comunidad organizando actividades para fortalecer el comité. También se ayudan para poder mejorar su comunidad, ya que su zona es muy rural, que aún está en crecimiento.
Todas las integrantes se dedican a actividades rurales, como ser la cría y venta de animales de corral, en lo que les va muy bien. Una de ellas es Margarita, quien pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para poder seguir con la cría de animales que cría y faena para la venta.
Margarita es una persona muy trabajadora y comprometida con su familia.
texts.en:
San Ramón Communal Bank is in its sixth loan cycle.  The members work together as a group in the community organizing activities to strengthen the bank.  They also help each other so they can improve their community, because they live in a very rural area that's still growing.  All of them make a living in rural activities like raising and selling farm animals, and it's going very well for them.

One of the members, Margarita, is requesting a loan to buy balanced feed to keep on raising and slaughtering animals to sell.

Margarita's a very hardworking person who's committed to her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Hector es de la ciudad de Villarrica, está en el último año de la carrera de contabilidad y auditoria, al mismo tiempo trabaja, y es de esa forma que él está luchando por su objetivo.
Ahora trabaja de auxiliar contable pero comenta que su meta es ser un profesional independiente que pueda ser útil a los demás.
Hector pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y con ello poder seguir sus estudios, y estar más cerca de su meta.
texts.en:
Hector lives in Villarrica City. He is a year away from getting his degree in Accounting and Audit. He also has a job, that helps him support himself to reach his goal.
He is currently working as an accounting aid, but he wants to become an independent professional to be able to serve others.
Hector is asking for this loan to be able to pay his tuition fees and continue to study and get closer to his goal.

loans.use: to pay for this college tuition fees.

loans.name: Rafaela Jani

texts.es:
La señora Rafaela Jani  es madre soltera de dos Hijos y trabaja  en un centro hospitalario  de la ciudad de León, desde hace veintidós años desempeñando  el cargo despachador de farmacia, se dedica a esta labor para la mantención de sus Hijos.

El crédito que solicito a Ceprodel lo utilizó para ayudarse a  los gastos de entrada a clases de sus hijos que   están en un nivel  universitario.  

Los sueños de Doña Rafaela es que sus hijos  coronen su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Rafaela Jani is a single mother of two. She has worked for a medical center in the city of León, for twenty two years, as a pharmacy dispatcher. She works hard to support her children.

She used this loan, that she requested from Ceprodel to pay for her children's college tuition fees. 

Rafaela's dream is to see her children develop their professional careers.

loans.use: to pay for her children's college tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients such as chicken, potatoes, oil, condiments, vegetables, rice, and other items

loans.name: Sandra Lissette

texts.es:
La señora Sandra Lissette trabaja  en la UNAN León     desempeñando el cargo de secretaria, desde hace veinticinco  años, labora  8am a 5 pm de lunes a viernes  en este mismo horario, es madre soltera de dos hijos 

El crédito que solicito a Ceprodel lo utilizó en compra semillas y bolsas para aumentar  las plantas de su vivero y así ofertar mayor  variedad y calidad de plantas. 

La Señora realiza esta labor para ayudarse a darles un mejor nivel de vida a sus dos hijos ya que es madre soltera.
texts.en:
Sandra Lissette has been a secretary at UNAN León University for twenty five years. She works 8 to 5, Monday through Friday. She is a single mother of two.

She used this loan, that she requested from Ceprodel to buy seeds and bags to increase her nursery stock and offer a better variety and quality of plants.

She supplements her income with this work to improve her children's quality of life, as she is a single mother.

loans.use: to buy seeds and bags

loans.name: Brenda Imara

texts.es:
La Joven Brenda Imara   es madre de tres  Hijos y se desempeña como secretaria en un colegio  de la ciudad de León, desde hace ocho años, ella se dedica a esta labor para ayudar a su esposo a solventar gastos del hogar.

El crédito que solicito a Ceprodel lo utilizó para comprar una bomba de agua y así mejor sus condiciones de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Young Brenda Imara is a mother of three. She has worked as a secretary at a college in the city of León, for eight years. She works to help her husband pay for their home expenses.

She used this loan, that she requested from Ceprodel to pay for a water pump and improve her and her family's life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a water pump

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus clientes a los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, junto a su esposa venden plátanos verde, maíz amarillo y también preparan chicha de jora que es una bebida típica de esta zona, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de insumos para la preparación de chicha de jora y de esta manera ofrecerlo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Isidro is 40 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of La Matanza, a community that mostly works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock and is located in the Morropon province which belongs to the Piura region on the northern coast of Perú.

He offers public transportation service with his own motorcycle taxi; he takes his customers to the small towns in the surrounding areas of his district.  Along with his wife, they sell green bananas and yellow corn, and also make "chicha de jora" which is a traditional drink of the area (it is made from fermented corn).  

He has asked for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy a greater quantity of supplies for making chicha de jora and thus offer it to his customers.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of supplies for making "chicha de jora" (a traditional Peruvian drink).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Zoya

texts.en:
Zoya is a woman from Tsaghkaber village. She lives there with her husband and 24-year-old son.

The family is engaged in agriculture. They have been keeping a livestock of cows, sheep and chickens and cultivating wheat, barley and potatoes over 15 years.

Zoya has now applied for this loan of 3,000 USD to be able to purchase agro machinery for gathering the harvest and barley seeds for cultivation. The loan will be a big support for Zoya's farm as she would be able to organize farming activities more efficiently. She dreams to have a big and profitable farm so her family will have appropriate living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for agro machinery for gathering the harvest, and barley seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more plastic bowls, buckets, plastic chairs and food containers for resale

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa y tambien sigue vendiendo zapatos, ella vende pantalones, polos,zapatos y chompas , por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, polos, chompas y casacas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member divides her day among activities related to her business buying and selling clothing and selling shoes.  She sells pants, polo shirts, shoes, and sweaters.  Through this business, this member is able to move her children ahead.

Martha wants to grow her business selling clothing.  She is requesting the loan in order to buy more clothing, like pants, polo shirts, sweaters, and jackets wholesale.

This member is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy clothing, like pants, polo shirts, sweaters, and jackets.

loans.name: Nicolás Nazario

texts.es:
El Señor Nicolás Nazario,  Trabaja en un hospital de la ciudad León desde hace seis años, desempeñando el cargo  de aseador hospitalario inicia sus labores a la 7 am y finaliza a las 3 pm de lunes a viernes en este mismo horario, se dedica a esta labor para llevar el sustento a su familia es padre de dos hijos. 

El crédito que solicito a Ceprodel lo utilizó para pago de  colegiatura y compra de útiles escolares, lo que le ayudara a solventar la necesidad para  que sus Hijos logren a coronar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Nicolás Nazario, has been working at a hospital in the city of León for 5 years, as part of the cleaning crew from 7am to 3pm, Monday through Friday. He works to support his family, as he is a father of two.

He used this loan, that he requested from Ceprodel, to pay for school and school supplies for his children, to cover their needs and to see them one day pursue a professional career.

loans.use: to pay for school expenses

loans.name: Maridel

texts.en:
Maridel is 27 years old and married with three children.

Maridel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Maridel has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

Maridel aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Munah

texts.en:
Munah runs a small stall where she sells mobile phone airtime credits. She lives in Lebak, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta. Munah is married and lives with four persons in the family home.

Munah began working with Ruma six months ago because she was interested in selling mobile airtime. She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits. For the last three months, she has had around $31 – $32 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). 

As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Révélation Bus Group

texts.fr: La Cliente Amani est une brave commerçante, d’une expérience de 4 ans et membre d’une Association d’Affaires  «Révélation Bus», entrepreneur dynamique, âgée de 35 ans et mère de 4 enfants, tous étudient. La cliente  est vendeuse de divers habits de lux et sociétaire d’un magasin. Elle installe ses marchandises dans un magasin de la ville. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre son activité. Elle va acheter 25 pièces de vestes. Elle démarra ses affaires avec le fonds  reçu de son mari, qui  lui aussi, est commerçant. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite accroitre son capital et  construire une maison en dur, scolariser, vêtir et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux  hommes et femmes entrepreneurs non bancables en leur accordant de crédit pendant, ce moment de post conflits dans la région de l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
Amani is a committed businesswoman with four years' experience.  She is a member of the business group 'Révélation Bus', a dynamic entrepreneur, 35 years old and mother to four children who all currently attend school.  She sells various luxury items of clothing in a local shop in the town.  She is a part owner of the shop.

She has requested this loan from the field partner, Hekima, in order to expand her business.  She will use the loan to buy 25 jackets.

In the future, Amani would like to increase her capital, build a sturdy house, educate, clothe and feed her children.

She is grateful to Hekima for the support they offer to male and female, non-bankable entrepreneurs by offering them loans during this post-conflict period in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 25 jackets for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more items like cement, iron rods, zinc sheets, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam lives in Katnaghbyur village with her husband, mother-in-law and three children (15, 14 and 9-years-old). Mariam and her family are running a farm. It includes cattle (4 cows, calves and chickens) and arable land where potato and grass is cultivated. Mariam milk's cows and gets cheese and other milk products and her husband sells it in the nearby markets. The family is hard working and they run their farm with great love and pleasure. Now, by asking for this loan of USD 1500 Mariam asks financial support to be able to purchase a cow and forage for feeding the livestock. It is very important for her to get this loan and have an opportunity to enlarge her agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Trinidad tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa propia en la que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña tienda en la cual comercializa variedad de productos como: huevos, azúcar, golosinas, sal, pan dulce, especias, etc. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Ella desea invertir en su negocio de tienda dado que desea aumentar sus ventas con el fin de incrementar sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de productos de tienda como: azúcar, frijoles, sal, golosinas, detergente, papel de baño y más artículos atractivos para los clientes.
texts.en:
Trinidad is fifty-four years old.  She lives in a house that she owns.  Through a lot of hard work and effort, she has established a small store in her home where she sells a variety of goods, including eggs, sugar, snacks, salt, sweet breads, spices, etc.  In doing this, she has been able to take control of her life and sustain her home.

She wishes to invest in her store.  She wants to grow her sales in order to grow her profits and income, which will allow her to ultimately improve the living conditions for both herself and family.  

For this reason, she has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy a variety of products that she sells in her store, including sugar, beans, salt, snacks, detergent, toilet paper, and other necessary items to attract customers.

loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, salt, snacks, detergent, toilet paper, etc.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a 30-year-old married man. He has 2 children. He describes himself to be optimistic. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a vibrant place and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of capital and insecurity. He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy motorcycle spare parts to service his motorcycle. His business goal is to own a tuk tuk within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will buy cows to do dairy farming. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans were paid successfully.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa lives with her husband, son and daughter in Mets Parni village. Her elder son serves in the army. Her husband and son are construction and seasonal migrant workers in a neighboring country. Larisa runs a farm to help tackle financial hardship. She keeps livestock (cows, 2 pigs and chickens) and cultivates wheat, potato and beet. The gathered harvest Larisa sells in the nearby open markets and gathers income which is very important for the family's living. Larisa applied for this loan to be able to purchase 4 oxen and potato seeds for cultivation. This will enable her to enlarge her farming activities and gather more income for her family. 

As this is Larisa's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for 4 oxen and potato seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more electrical items such as refrigerators, extension cords, and DVD players for resale.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a married woman aged 46 years with five children. She runs a retail shop selling cereals in Kisumu. The business is in a busy town in Kisumu. She describes herself as an aggressive business lady, and therefore, expects the business to have grown and expanded in the next five years.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for the cereals shop

loans.name: Juana Anita

texts.es:
Juana vive en la calidad ciudad de Pucallpa, ella es una mujer muy carismática, sobre todo porque es madre de 4 hijos a los cuales quiere mucho y es por ello que siempre demuestra mucho optimismo y cada día trabaja muy duro para poder salir adelante, es por ello que labora como empleada de limpieza en una institución pública de su ciudad hace 6 años, asimismo por las tardes vende marcianos y chupetes de fruta en su vivienda ya que de su trabajo depende el poder solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Juana esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda, ya que estos meses ha llovido mucho, así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Sacar adelante a su familia”.
texts.en:
Juana lives in the warm city of Pucallpa. She is a very charismatic woman, but most of all, she is the mother of four children who she loves dearly. For this reason, she has always displayed great optimism and worked hard each day in order to get ahead. Juana has been working as a housekeeping employee at a public institution in the city for the past six years. At the same, she has been selling fruit popsicles and ice candies from her house. Her work enables her to cover her household expenses.
